body: If nothing checks then it could end up with a failure in one of the `IValue::to...` methods at runtime versus failing here with some more helpful info ([callsite](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/11834/files#diff-c7fa0d815e308a9fc70b52c9a049a8a3R1062))
